This player is build using the following code.

<script type="text/javascript">
  $(function() {
    $("#osmplayer").osmplayer({
      playlist: 'playlist.xml',
      height: '500px'
    });
  });
</script>
<div id="osmplayer"></div>

Using the following playlist.
